overview: Going through a rebellious phase and family problems, Jie Yu chose to take refuge in the safe harbor of friend Yan Shiu. As the relationship between them develops further, the attraction of Yan Shiu towards Jie Yu also grows. The film describes the main character Jie Yu stuck in the middle between friendship and romance, he seeks for sanctuary between lust and emotion. During the process, his weak character leads his emotions through happiness, avoidance and pain. Running away from home, through 16km of night, reflects the emotions of Jie Yu for Yan Shiu, as slowly he starts to face his own emotions.
title: Stay With Me
